headline: These factors are driving auto inflation
summary: The November Consumer Price Index (CPI) revealed an uptick in auto inflation, with both new and used car prices showing month-over-month increases. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian delves into the key factors driving this rise in automotive pricing pressures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: GM's Cruise robotaxi exit a result of 'serious problems' from scaling too fast and continued high costs
summary: General Motors pulled the plug on its Cruise robotaxi business on Tuesday night, a move marking a dramatic step back in its autonomous ambitions that began eight years ago.
